alert.note: Alert for Rota; Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued December 15 at 4:53PM ChST until December 18 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents along east facing reefs. * WHERE...East facing reefs of the Marianas. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. Pounding surf along east reefs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Buoy data and surf observations indicate north swell has subsided below hazardous levels of 7 to 9 feet. Continue to exercise caution as surf will still be elevated along north facing reefs the next few days.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
